column4: Hi room, I would like to upgrade to the latest Ubuntu kernel and compare how my application runs agains the current one.  Hence I need to boot into one kernel and then go back and boot into the other.  First question regarding this 1) What packages do I need to install for the latest 2.6.28.15.20 kernel? -- is there a single meta-package?
Actually it should have been the !kernel factoid there
cool, thanks.  It was option #2 on that Wiki page of pre-built kernels I was looking for
